name: Shapeshifter Foil
prerequisiteFormula: (@skill:knowledge_arcana >= 5 OR @skill:knowledge_nature >= 5) AND "ability to use any polymorph effect"
descriptionText: Your command of shapeshifting magic can disrupt similar effects in others.
benefitText: A creature you deal damage to has difficulty using or maintaining polymorph effects until the end your next turn. To use a polymorph effect it must make a concentration check (DC 15 + twice the level of the effect). If you deal damage to an opponent under a polymorph effect, that opponent must succeed at a Will saving throw (DC 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom modifier) or be forced back to its original form. If you score a critical hit against such an opponent, no saving throw is allowed.
